#summary Build the binary with the API of KFS.

1. Check out the code for the branch of mt2kfs.
{{{
svn checkout https://maxtable.googlecode.com/svn/branches/mt2kfs maxtable
}}}
2. Change the Makefile with your KFS's directory of include and library
{{{
KFSFLAG = -I{YOUR_KFS_INCLUDE} -L{YOUR_KFS_LIBRARY} -L{YOUR_KFS_LIBRARY} -lkfsClient -lboost_regex
}}}
2. BUild the library.
{{{
cd maxtable
make kfsfacer_o
make kfsfacer_a
}}}
3. Build the binary.
{{{
cd maxtable
make master
make ranger
}}}
